summary: very first mod for me or u can call it a lil thing .. place for your slaves lol ...
descriptionHtml:
first of all my english is not good enough so i am sry people..
and plz be gentle its the first thing i did and i like to share it

its a place for ur followers, slaves , it contain 2 rooms 
1- the main room it contains beds, tabels, and few tools, it also contain a chest with hundreds of slaves collar, whip, ulfric gag,

2- smithing room it contain everything u need to create, upgrade, enchant, (wep, armor, clothes ...)
and chests contain most things u need (ignots, gems, leathers, ....)

this mod require the following :
1- latest skyrim..
2- bb luxury suite 
3- paradise hall
4- apachii hair

just copy the esp file into the data folder ...

location near evil lair of hydra if u know its location or take a look at pictures
author: afterlife37
